thread.title: Andrew Bogut didn't practice due to visa issue, still expected to be in uniform for Cavs tonight
thread.title_full: Andrew Bogut didn't practice due to visa issue, still expected to be in uniform for Cavs tonight

author: Joe Vardon, Cleveland.com
title: Andrew Bogut didn't practice due to visa issue, still expected to be in uniform for Cavs tonight
text: INDEPENDENCE, Ohio -- Andrew Bogut attended Cavs' shootraround but did not participate due to a work visa issue, according to team officials. Bogut, the 7-foot Australian who signed with the Cavs last week for $385,000 to play the rest of the...
